title: Tata Power and Adaro International in arbitration over coal supply dispute
description: Tata Power Company Ltd and Adaro International are in a legal dispute over a coal supply agreement for the Trombay power plant. Both companies have filed claims against each other, with the case now at the International Court of Arbitration. Discussions for an amicable resolution are ongoing.
